verses.name: Exodus 40:20
verses.text: And he took and put the testimony into the ark, and set the staves on the ark, and put the mercy seat above upon the ark:

verses.name: Exodus 40:21
verses.text: And he brought the ark into the tabernacle, and set up the vail of the covering, and covered the ark of the testimony; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Exodus 40:22
verses.text: And he put the table in the tent of the congregation, upon the side of the tabernacle northward, without the vail.

verses.name: Exodus 40:23
verses.text: And he set the bread in order upon it before the Lord; as the Lord had commanded Moses.
